attributes.action: We the UK public want a full PUBLIC enquiry into Rotherham Rape Gangs.
attributes.additional_details: The revelations of what has happened in regards to the Rotherham Grooming Gangs and many more across the UK clearly show things were covered up and brushed under the carpet. The victims and the UK Public deserve to have answers.
attributes.background: We want a FULL PUBLIC Enquiry into the actions of the CPS, MP's, Police with full disclosure of all findings available to the general public and press.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
